text: Lick Fork is a stream in Boone and Randolph County in the U.S. state of Missouri. It is a tributary of Perche Creek. Lick Fork was named for the mineral licks in the area. ==See also== *List of rivers of Missouri ==References== Category:Rivers of Boone County, Missouri Category:Rivers of Randolph County, Missouri Category:Rivers of Missouri
title: Lick Fork (Perche Creek tributary)
